keywords module¶

class keywords.KeyWords(filepath=None)¶

Bases: object

This class is used exclusively to search the text with a list of keywords and record their occurrence.

Parameters

filepath (str) – An optional filepath to a .csv containing a list of keywords. Not providing a filepath means starting with an empty keyword list that can be filled in over time.

add_keyword(word)¶

Use to add a keyword to the current keyword list, as well as add it to the given .csv file assuming one was given.

Parameters

word (str) – This should be a single word to be added to the keywords

Returns

True if added successfully, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

occurrence(text)¶

Use to count the occurrence of every keyword in a given text.

Parameters

text (str) – This is the raw text that you want to check.

Returns

This is a list of pairs, where each pair consists of the keyword followed by the number of occurrences of it in the text.

Return type

list

remove_keyword(word)¶

Use to remove a keyword to the current keyword list, as well as remove it from the given .csv file assuming one was given. If the file doesn’t exist in the keyword list, then simply return True.

Parameters

word (str) – This should be a single word to be removed from the keywords

Returns

True if added successfully, False otherwise.

Return type

bool
